Name: Dotto Botto
About the game: Dotto Botto is a classic Super Mario Bros. platformer game. Help Dotto to find his way home and try to beat all the levels! You will face deadly enemies, weird creatures and hideous obstacles on your way back home, so be careful! Features 10 Levels full of moving platforms, obstacles, power-ups, spikes, enemies and much more! (not so much more, actually) 2 game endings! (yes, not 1 but 2!!!! unbelievable!!!) Colorful pixelated graphics Both Gamepad and Keyboard supported A monstrous Final Boss! 4 Different enemies Dozens of traps and obstacles! Game Controls Gamepad D-pad Or Left-stick = Move A / B = Jump / Skip Intro / Select Start / Back = Pause Game Keyboard Wasd Or Arrow Keys = Move/ Jump Spacebar = Skip Intro/ Jump / Select P / Esc = Pause Game
